[[inst_hl_sd_pcr]]
==== HL.SD.PCR

*Syntax:* hl.sd.pcr SrcL, [<symbol>]

*Description:* Long (48-bit) instruction encoding.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_sd_pcr.svg[HL.SD.PCR encoding,width=800]

*Uop-Class:* STA/PC_REL

*Compression:* HL48 (len=48)

*Uop-Class payload:* `{"addr_mode": "PC_REL", "agu_kind": "STA", "note": "User confirmed A", "source": "group_rule", "split": ["AGU", "STD"], "uop_kind": "AGU"}`
